word: Men can become just as were the Pharisees,--wide awake to condemn the greatest teacher that the world ever knew. Christ gave unmistakable evidence that he was sent of God, yet the Jewish rulers took upon themselves the work the enemy prompted them to do, and charged him who made the Sabbath, who was lord of the Sabbath, with being a Sabbath breaker. O the foolishness of men! the weakness of men!
